org.vanted.animation.animations

Class VisibilityAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanted.animation.Animation<BooleanTimePoint>
      • org.vanted.animation.animations.VisibilityAnimation

  • public class VisibilityAnimation
extends Animation<BooleanTimePoint>
    Animates the visibility of an Attributable object.
    BooleanTimePoint data values:
    True = Hidden
    False = Visible
    Author:
    - Patrick Shaw

      void animate(double time)
      Implements what the animation is actually animating.
      In this method the graphical interface will actually be modified.

      • animate

        public void animate(double time)
        Description copied from class: Animation
        Implements what the animation is actually animating.
        In this method the graphical interface will actually be modified.
        Parameters:
        time - The time since the start of the loop in milliseconds.
